programme.title: Around the World in 80 Weighs - EP 4
programme.desc: If current trends continue, a quarter of the world's population will be obese by 2035; it is a global crisis. The six tourists come face-to-face with the horrors of the obesity crisis in different parts of the world and confront the alarming truth of what may await them if they don't tackle their own challenges. At the end of each week, participants are weighed together on a giant scale to see if their hard work trying to lose weight - and the shocking things they have seen - has paid off.

programme.desc: Beginning from the 1970s, an abnormally high number of children in Vietnam were born with serious birth defects and health conditions. From there, Dian then worked part-time at a restaurant owned by Abi's family. However, Dian said, "You are a Madesu, the Future is Bleak.

programme.title: DEWI RINDU - EP 27
programme.desc: Dewi is a girl with big dreams. She is determined to become successful and lift her family out of economic hardship. But who would have thought that her beautiful dream would be shattered and she would have to face the bitter reality of being pregnant out of wedlock.

programme.title: Sejauh Ini Yang Paling Jauh Adalah Nyariin Kamu
programme.desc: Luna was arranged by her mother to marry a rich and possessive man named Baim. Luna, who flatly rejected the matchmaking, showed her dislike for Baim in front of her mother. One day, Luna ran away from home and accidentally got into Akbar's car.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 481
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. programme.title: Duren Caem Gini Masa Iya Disekip
programme.desc: A handsome widower named Doni who has two children, a girl and a boy. Doni, who is alone after his wife passed away, actually needs a life partner, but Doni is reluctant to date. On the other hand, there is a woman named Wita who plans a kidnapping in a big house with her boyfriend. To smooth her plan, Wita disguises herself as Dewi and becomes a babysitter at the house she is targeting, namely Doni's house.

programme.desc: Ajay Mehra trains to be a boxer but returns home to find his brother missing. Accused of murder, he escapes jail to seek revenge on a corrupt businessman. Release Year: 1990 Director: Rajkumar Santoshi Awards: Best Film: Dharamendra, Best Actor: Sunny Deol, Best Director: Rajkumar Santoshi, Best Story Writer: Rajkumar Santoshi, Best Editor Filmfare Awards

programme.title: Karz
programme.desc: Ravi's new wife kills him and then along with Sir Judah takes over his family estate. Ravi is reborn as Monty and seeks revenge. Release Year: 1980 Director: Subhash Ghai Awards: Filmfare Awards- Best Music Director- Laxmikant Shantaram Kudalkar , Pyarelal Ramprasad Sharma .

programme.title: Gadar 2

programme.title: Naam Shabana
programme.desc: After serving time for killing her abusive father, Shabana is recruited by an Indian spy agency for a highly classified mission. Release Year: 2017 Director: Shivam Nair Awards: 2018 Winner Special Award- Extraordinary Impact ActreSS- Taapsee Pannu

programme.title: Singapenne
programme.desc: Born into a humble & rustic background troubled by familial & financial concerns, Anandhi takes it upon herself to leave home & fearlessly pursue a better life for her family. Watch her bravely face the odds of life with unwavering spirit.

programme.title: Poongodi
programme.desc: Poongodi rises above her father's male chauvinism, intent on proving herself & pursuing a college education. Her path crosses with Saravanan, a naïve young man who blindly trusts his manipulative stepmother. Uncover the fate of the two kindred souls.

programme.title: Punitha
programme.desc: Maragatham holds her step-daughter Punitha dear, to the point of being overbearing. However, their bond turns twisted & burdened when Punitha finds her soulmate, Kabilan. Amidst family betrayals, can Punitha show her mother the true meaning of love?

programme.title: MANAMAGALE VAA
programme.desc: Narmada's mission to her ancestral village to reunite her father & his estranged family entwines with Kathir's task of finding suitable grooms for his three sisters. What unfolds when they fall in love, striving for a cause against the same enemy?

programme.title: VINODHINI

programme.title: PUTHU VASANTHAM
programme.desc: Raised as a single child, Selvi longs for the loving embrace & heart-warming bond of a joint family. And when her dream comes true, watch her battle all odds & win over her husband's large family.

programme.title: Ilakkiya

programme.title: Ding Dong : Montre-Moi Ta Maison ! - EP 11
programme.desc: In the canton of Basel, we visit the home of Daniel, a fan of antiques who has built and decorated his house thanks to his passion for ancient objects. Then we discover the house of Paul, who has turned an electric transformer station into a home.

programme.title: Chroniques D'en Haut - EP 4
programme.desc: Between Italy, Savoie and the Hautes-Alpes, the Claree Valley is considered one of the most beautiful Alpine valleys. Unspoilt, with no major tourist infrastructure, it offers sublime landscapes between larch forests and rocky cliffs. It is particularly well-known to fans of the crime series ''Alex Hugo''.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est Dans La Boite ! - EP 9
programme.desc: Every day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box on the set. But what does it contain? It's always a surprising object that leads them to discover very different subjects: turtles, bowling or even cloud formation.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus - EP 12
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Yetili - EP 25
programme.desc: Nina and Leon, two little mice, live in a bookshop whose mascot is a large yeti cuddly toy called Yetili. Each evening, once the bookshop has closed, Yetili comes to life and settles his two friends on his knees to read them a story.

programme.title: Dessine Les Animaux Avec Koumi - EP 42
programme.desc: Koumi is 6 years old, mischievous and always full of fun. The dream of her life is to know all the animals of the world, and she absolutely loves drawing! In each episode she explains how to draw animals really well.

programme.title: La Petite Pokou - EP 23
programme.desc: Kongoue Bian seems to have become possessed by a spirit and hurls himself at Ebri Morrow intent on grabbing his purse. Pokou passes her final test. The High Priestess recounts the story of Anansi.

programme.title: La Petite Pokou - EP 24
programme.desc: Pokou returns to Kumassi in a bubble with N'zi and Lucio. Ebri Morrow uses a spider's web to immobilise Kongoue Bian without getting close to him: he ties him up with the strands of the web and gradually draws him closer.

programme.title: Tout Le Monde Veut Prendre Sa Place
programme.desc: The game where everyone wants to be a winner. One quiz, six candidates and, comfortably installed in his chair, one champion... whom everyone dreams of unseating!

programme.title: Itineraires Paysans - EP 15
programme.desc: The different attitudes and approaches of French farmers in terms of the environment, economy and landscape. A practical way of understanding a region and its terroir through their working practices.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Le Point - EP 9
programme.desc: Magazine programme which explores issues relating to society, science and the environment, involving investigations and in-depth analysis, from a resolutely Canadian perspective.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (1 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: A Ciel Ouvert
programme.desc: Alysson views her body with distrust. Evanne seeks escape until the fall. Amina can't get her words out of her mouth... Le Courtil lies on the border between France and Belgium, an unusual place that cares for these children with psychological and social difficulties.

programme.title: Trajet De Nuit
programme.desc: Paris, 3 a.m. A young rideshare driver picks up his passenger. The conversation begins, the routine breaks, but the ride will turn into a confrontation.

programme.title: Lebowitz Contre Lebowitz - EP 7
programme.desc: Paule is falling increasingly in love with Julien, a situation firmly disapproved of by the law firm. Consumed by guilt, Irene is determined to watch over her, to the point of following her into the most extreme situations. Together they even go as far as exhuming a victim's body...

programme.title: Lebowitz Contre Lebowitz - EP 8
programme.desc: Paule and Irene take a major pharmaceutical company to court for having marketed a drug dangerous for young children. By working together they manage to win the confidence of a cardiologist, a whistle-blower sidelined by her superior because of her accusations.

programme.title: Movie - Aadukalam
programme.desc: Pettaikaaran is famous in his town for an impeccable track record of successes in rooster fights. When one of his aides, Karuppu, goes against his word in a fight, it leads to an enmity between them.

programme.title: Movie - Udhayam NH4
programme.desc: Prabhu, a young college student, kidnaps his lover Rithika when her father disapproves of their relationship. Manoj Menon, an encounter specialist, is appointed to track them down.

programme.title: Movie - Paarthanabagam Illayo
programme.desc: Twin sisters separated at birth are raised differently. Confusion ensues when years later they are mistaken for each other.

programme.title: Movie - Mythili
programme.desc: Deepu dreams of becoming famous by making a musical album, and strange things begin to happen when they film a music video in a haunted house.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Star
programme.desc: Dhanushkodi has pledged to kill Santosh, so his father sends him away and hires Murthy to masquerade as Santosh. Murthy is in love with Santosh's cousin and hence willing to risk his life.

programme.title: Movie - Nilave Malare
programme.desc: Raghu struggles when his wife Janaki meets with an untimely death, leaving their daughter Priya depressed. Their life changes when Sheela, a lookalike of Janaki, agrees to take care of Priya.

programme.title: Movie - Malabar Police
programme.desc: A young couple in love elopes to get married. They witness a minister's murder in a secluded temple. A police officer from Kerala investigates the murder and unveils the real brain behind the murder.

programme.title: Movie - Manasellam
programme.desc: A helpless Bala finds a place to stay with a kind-hearted shopkeeper. His room-mates, in order to ruin his chances with a cute neighbour, hatch a vicious plan and get him beaten.

programme.title: Movie - Giri
programme.desc: Two feuding landlords struggle to destroy each other. When one of them loses his son, he vows to kill the son of his rival. The boy, however, manages to escape only to return 20 years later.

programme.title: Movie - Orampo
programme.desc: Chandru races his autorickshaw for sport while his friend Bigilu acts as his mechanic. However, tragedy strikes when he begins to date Bigilu's niece while simultaneously challenging a rival racer.

programme.title: Movie - Putham Pudhu Payanam
programme.desc: Three people who have blood cancer meet another rich guy with the same condition at a hospital. They all have only a few months to live. Over time, they become friends, leave hospital, and go to a village which is being terrorized.

programme.title: Movie - Kaadhal Pisase
programme.desc: Vasantha, the son of a maid, pursue higher education as he aspires to have a successful career. However, his life takes a drastic turn when several circumstances force him to become a criminal.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Adaavadi
programme.desc: An actress falls in love with an arrogant filmmaker and tries in vain to make him love her back. When he finally does, she leaves him for another man. The shattered man is unable to work any more.

programme.title: Movie - Ilavarasan
programme.desc: Ilavarasan and his widowed mother lead a reclusive life in a village. As a grown-up, he learns how his mother was framed for her husband's murder by her brother-in-law. He then decides to avenge her.

programme.title: Movie - Shankar Guru
programme.desc: Shankar Guru, an honest man, fights for the rights of poor people. When Seeta falls in love with him, a few gangsters try to attack her to teach Shankar a lesson.

programme.title: Movie - Ranuva Veeran
programme.desc: Raghu returns to his village and learns that people are being terrorised by a notorious gang. His world comes crashing down when he realises that his sister is in love with the leader of the gang.

programme.title: Movie - Dharma Prabhu
programme.desc: Yama attempts to save an innocent child and accidentally rescues a corrupt politician along with her. Lord Shiva, who is furious about Yama's mistake, gives him an ultimatum to amend the situation.

programme.desc: The 2025 ICC Women's Cricket World Cup will be the 13th edition of Women's Cricket World Cup. programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 16
programme.desc: Few players have had a journey to the Premier League like Brentford's Igor Thiago. Ten years ago, he was working as a bricklayer on the outskirts of Brasilia to support his family. Fast forward a decade, with stops at Ludogorets and Club Brugge in between, he is second only to Erling Haaland in Premier League goals this season, after a debut campaign disrupted by injury.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 26
programme.desc: We sit down for an exclusive interview with the first of two new Premier League Hall of fame inductees, Eden Hazard. A celebrated footballer who lit up the English top-flight during his illustrious career; a winner of multiple domestic and European honours, he became a true legend of the Premier League era. He reflects on his rise to the top, the moments that defined his career, and the immense pride he feels at joining the elite ranks of the Premier League's greatest ever players.

programme.title: 1-TO-11 - EP 5
programme.desc: Known simply as 'The Yak,' Yakubu takes on 1-to-11, selecting his ultimate lineup from the best players he shared the pitch with. A powerhouse striker with 95 Premier League goals across spells at Portsmouth, Middlesbrough, Everton, and Blackburn, he reflects on the teammates who made the biggest impression during his career. Expect a team full of strength, flair, and goalscoring pedigree.

programme.desc: Review covers all the action from Matchweek 13, first up for the weekend is Burnley travelling down to Brentford, Everton host Newcastle, and then Chelsea face Arsenal at the Bridge.

programme.title: Classic Match
programme.desc: We delve into the Premier League archive to bring you a Classic Match from the 2013/2014 season.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 9
programme.desc: Newcastle United are a team on the rise under Eddie Howe; a manager quietly rewriting the modern history of the club. With exclusive access and interviews from inside St. James' Park, we uncover the transformation Howe has led, from stabilising the team to delivering silverware and reigniting belief on Tyneside. As the Magpies set their sights on even greater heights, we ask just how far he can take this ambitious, resurgent club.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 7
programme.desc: Arriving in England on a scholarship at the age of 15, Harry Kewell went on to become one of the greatest Australian footballers to have played the game. He looks back at some of his most memorable Premier League moments at Leeds United and Liverpool.

programme.title: West Ham United vs Liverpool (MW13) (Live) - EP 129
programme.desc: West Ham have won just one of their last 18 Premier League games against Liverpool (D3 L14), beating them 3-2 at the London Stadium in November 2021.

programme.title: Chelsea vs Arsenal (MW13) (Live) - EP 130
programme.desc: Chelsea have won just one of their last 11 Premier League games against Arsenal (D3 L7) and are winless in seven (D2 L5) since a 2-0 win at the Emirates in August 2021.

programme.title: The Big Interview 2025/26 - EP 16
programme.desc: Few players have had a journey to the Premier League like Brentford's Igor Thiago. Ten years ago, he was working as a bricklayer on the outskirts of Brasilia to support his family. Fast forward a decade, with stops at Ludogorets and Club Brugge in between, he is second only to Erling Haaland in Premier League goals this season, after a debut campaign disrupted by injury.

programme.title: Brentford vs Burnley (MW13) - EP 121
programme.desc: Only Arsenal and Man City have won more home games (5 each) and scored more home goals (16 each) than Brentford in the Premier League this season (4 wins, 12 goals).

programme.title: Sunderland vs Bournemouth (MW13) - EP 123
programme.desc: This is the first league meeting between Sunderland and Bournemouth since April 2017, with the Cherries winning 1-0 at the Stadium of Light to confirm Sunderland’s relegation from the Premier League.

programme.title: Crystal Palace vs Manchester United (MW13) - EP 126
programme.desc: Crystal Palace have won three of their last four league games against Manchester United (D1), as many as they had in their previous 30 (W3 D6 L21).

programme.title: Chelsea vs Arsenal (MW13) - EP 130
programme.desc: Chelsea have won just one of their last 11 Premier League games against Arsenal (D3 L7) and are winless in seven (D2 L5) since a 2-0 win at the Emirates in August 2021.

programme.title: West Ham United vs Liverpool (MW13) - EP 129
programme.desc: West Ham have won just one of their last 18 Premier League games against Liverpool (D3 L14), beating them 3-2 at the London Stadium in November 2021.

programme.title: Aston Villa vs Wolverhampton Wanderers (MW13) - EP 127
programme.desc: Aston Villa have lost just one of their last 24 Premier League home games (W15 D8), going down 3-0 against Crystal Palace in August.

programme.title: Nottingham Forest vs Brighton and Hove Albion (MW13) - EP 128
programme.desc: Nottingham Forest have won two of their three Premier League home games against Brighton (L1), winning 7-0 in this exact fixture last term.

programme.title: Everton vs Newcastle United (MW13) - EP 124
programme.desc: Newcastle are winless in their last four Premier League games against Everton (D2 L2), having won five of their previous six against the Toffees (L1).

programme.title: PL Rewind 2025/26 - EP 8
programme.desc: Darren Bent is one of a select number of players to have scored a century of goals in the Premier League. The prolific striker recalls his days at Ipswich, Charlton, Spurs, Sunderland, and Aston Villa and the goals he scored on his way to joining that elite group.

programme.title: PL Stories 2025/26 - EP 26
programme.desc: We sit down for an exclusive interview with the first of two new Premier League Hall of fame inductees, Eden Hazard. A celebrated footballer who lit up the English top-flight during his illustrious career; a winner of multiple domestic and European honours, he became a true legend of the Premier League era. He reflects on his rise to the top, the moments that defined his career, and the immense pride he feels at joining the elite ranks of the Premier League’s greatest ever players.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA
programme.desc: The 16th Annual Fighters Only World MMA Awards are back this month on FIGHT SPORTSR, hosted again by one of the most entertaining personalities in MMA, Chael Sonnen and taking place at the Theater at the Virgin Hotels in Las Vegas. The event has become an annual tradition to honor the best fighters and moments in MMA over the previous year, including awards for male and female Fighter of the Year, Knockout of the Year, Fight of the Year, and many, many more.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Sergio Martinez vs. Paul Williams I
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features middleweights Sergio 'Maravilla' Martinez (44-1, 24 KOs) vs. Paul 'The Punisher' Williams (37-1, 27 KOs) from Boardwalk Hall in Atlantic City, New Jersey, USA, on December 5, 2009. The result was a controversial majority decision, and the two would eventually square off in a rematch about a year later.

programme.title: XMA
programme.desc: In this episode we focus on the martial art of breaking and how the techniques are fine-tuned with technology.

programme.title: BWF Martial Arts
programme.desc: This episode features highlights from the Men's Weapons as well as Girl's Forms and Team Demo highlights.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Andre Berto vs. David Estrada
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a bout to determine a new NABF welterweight champion, as Andre Berto faces David Estrada. Also on the card, kickboxing legends Errol Zimmerman and Daniel Ghita battle to a gruesome end.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 5 featuring Kakuryu, Tochinoshin, Shodai and Hakuho from the Natsu basho, 2018.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: The second group of competitors race each other and the clock to complete Stage 1. In addition to old nemeses like the Giant Ring and Jumping Spider, contestants will face new obstacles: Piston Road and the Silk Slider.

programme.desc: This episode features a lightweight title bout between Juan Manuel Marquez and Juan Diaz, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: Karate 1 Premier League
programme.desc: Dublin, Ireland welcomes one of the most anticipated events in Martial Arts this year as the Karate 1 Premier League returns. This will be the first Karate 1 Premier League event to take place in Dublin, with many of the top competitors in the world making the journey to Ireland for the first time and where the new Grand Winners will be crowned.

The event has become an annual tradition to honor the best fighters and moments in MMA over the previous year, including awards for male and female Fighter of the Year, Knockout of the Year, Fight of the Year, and many, many more.

programme.title: MEGA Fights In 60 Andre Berto vs. Victor Ortiz
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features The Ring Magazine's 2011 Fight of The Year from the Foxwoods Resort in Mashantucket, Connecticut, USA. Undefeated welterweight world champion Andre Berto (27-0, 21 KOs) puts his title on the line against 'Vicious' Victor Ortiz (28-2, 22 KOs) in a fight that restores your passion in the sport of boxing.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Roberto Duran vs. Sean Fitzgerald
programme.desc: One of the greatest fighters of all time, Boxing Hall of Famer Roberto Duran, continues his comeback against Worcester, Massachusetts native Sean Fitzgerald. Duran would enter the bout coming off three straight victories, looking to continue his run towards another shot at a world championship. He would get more than he bargained for against the young undefeated Fitzgerald, who gave Duran a more competitive fight than anyone could have expected.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Floyd Mayweather vs. Juan Manuel Marquez
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Floyd Mayweather's return to boxing after a 21-month retirement. He takes on Juan Manuel Marquez in a fight that saw 1 million pay-per-view buys for a revenue of $52 million. Also on the card, action from a young Sergey Kovalev.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 1 featuring Kagayaki, Kaisei, Ichinojo and Goeido from the Nagoya basho, 2018.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this special one hour episode, we see the best of the World Judo Championships from Budapest where everyone in the world swarms to witness the crowning of 14 world champions. Also, world renowned fighter Teddy Riner experiences his hardest title defense in his career.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Dricus Du Plessis vs. Rafal Haratyk
programme.desc: This episode features coverage of mixed martial arts headlined by an incredible middleweight fight that ends with a tapout between Dricus Du Plessis and Rafal Haratyk. Bonus coverage includes a middleweight melee that ends in submission between Mark Hulme and Gordon Roodman and a female strawweight fight that goes the distance between Danella Eliasov and Irene Rivera.

programme.title: MEGA Fights In 60 Andre Berto vs. Victor Ortiz
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features The Ring Magazine's 2011 Fight of The Year from the Foxwoods Resort in Mashantucket, Connecticut, USA. Undefeated welterweight world champion Andre Berto (27-0, 21 KOs) puts his title on the line against 'Vicious' Victor Ortiz (28-2, 22 KOs) in a fight that restores your passion in the sport of boxing.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Roberto Duran vs. Sean Fitzgerald
programme.desc: One of the greatest fighters of all time, Boxing Hall of Famer Roberto Duran, continues his comeback against Worcester, Massachusetts native Sean Fitzgerald. Duran would enter the bout coming off three straight victories, looking to continue his run towards another shot at a world championship. He would get more than he bargained for against the young undefeated Fitzgerald, who gave Duran a more competitive fight than anyone could have expected.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Floyd Mayweather vs. Juan Manuel Marquez
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Floyd Mayweather's return to boxing after a 21-month retirement. He takes on Juan Manuel Marquez in a fight that saw 1 million pay-per-view buys for a revenue of $52 million. Also on the card, action from a young Sergey Kovalev.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo

programme.title: Judo for the World

Who cares if he never finished high school? Thornton's pockets are deep enough to buy his way in! But when he steals his professor's girlfriend (Sally Kellerman), Thornton goes just a little too far. Now, he'll have to hit the books, instead of his bank account - or go back to being the world's wealthiest dropout!

programme.title: Late Night with Seth Meyers - EP 1738
programme.desc: Emmy Award-nominated "Late Night with Seth Meyers," hosted by award-winning writer and performer Seth Meyers, is home to incisive humor, topical jokes and A-list celebrity guests. The series’ signature "A Closer Look" segment has garnered millions of views and is widely lauded for its tightly written and thoughtful approach to analyzing and satirizing news of the day.

programme.title: Closing Bell - EP 1
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Dialogue
programme.desc: Dialogue is a prime time daily English talk show on CGTN. Local correspondents and local production teams provide authoritative and in-depth stories from across the region. Africa Live is an objective and comprehensive look at every facet of African life.

programme.title: Asia Today
programme.desc: Asia Today highlights the latest news and social developments across Asia. Correspondents in over a dozen countries report on the region’s top stories as they happen. Analysts bring Asian perspective to topical and developing issues. Asia Today also emphasizes the diverse cultures and lifestyles of the world’s most populous continent.

programme.title: Dialogue
programme.desc: Dialogue is a prime time daily English talk show on CGTN. The 30-minute talk show covers a wide range of domestic and international topics, providing a balanced and critical perspective on current affairs and analysis within the framework of cross-cultural and multi-disciplinary comparisons. Inviting decision makers in government, business and academia onto the show, the host encourages guests to speak their minds frankly.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: China 24
programme.desc: China 24 is a prime time news program featuring in-depth reports and analysis of the stories in the headlines in China. Produced by CGTN’s studios in Beijing and Washington D.C., the show takes a compelling and comprehensive look at China. It explores the country’s business, politics, technology, culture, entertainment and more. China 24 tackles head-on the issues that matter most to the nation and its people, with topical reports highlighting challenges facing this fast-changing country.

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTN’s English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies.

programme.title: The Hub With Wang Guan
programme.desc: The Hub with Wang Guan covers hot-button geopolitical and economic issues, as well as interesting stories and trends in culture, education, technology and lifestyle. It aims to connect people, cultures and societies across the East and the West. The program features dynamic designs, fast pace and rich visuals to keep viewers engaged. It also makes use of trending topics online, while focusing on what’s relevant in China and the world.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: World Insight with Tian Wei
programme.desc: World Insight with Tian Wei is a long-running international platform for debate and intelligent discussion. It is the meeting point of both the highly influential and rising voices, facilitated by host, Tian Wei. Every Monday to Friday, it provides nutrition to form your own thoughts and ideas through live debate and interviews. Live debates linking movers and shakers take place in the signature segment "Global Debate".

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: The Vibe
programme.desc: The Vibe is a 30-minute TV show that runs daily on weekdays on CGTN. The content focuses on exciting new trends, fashion, and cultural topics across a range of disciplines both in China and abroad. The host presents various culture-related topics in a fun way while also doing some in-depth analysis to give viewers a fuller picture as to what is happening, and why it matters.

programme.desc: What is being done behind white sheets surrounding the sites of disassembly works of buildings? This show introduces the powerful and delicate techniques of disassembly works in Japan!

programme.title: What the Villains Have to Say
programme.desc: Cockroaches, Carbon dioxide, Unwanted hair... Villains are anathema to the public as being "dirty, noxious, and ugly." But even villains have a point they want you to hear! In this program, we look at their amazing abilities revealed by the latest research, as well as the real villains, who are actually a little bit fascinating!

programme.title: Historical Drama "UNBOUND" Eps. 46 (R)
programme.desc: Tsutaju is at an impasse, unable to produce an actor portrait he feels satisfied with. Then, driven by Tei’s heartfelt plea to see a work that only the two of them can create, Utamaro returns to Koshodo. The actor portraits are eventually completed, and on the opening day of the summer performances, he releases 28 prints all at once under the name Toshusai Sharaku. Soon, rumors of Sharaku spread throughout Edo Castle.

programme.title: Ukiyoe EDO-LIFE (R)
programme.desc: Let’s look into the world of Ukiyoe to learn how people lived in Edo period!

programme.title: Hello! NHK WORLD-JAPAN

programme.title: Drama Serial "The Ghost Writer's Wife" Eps. 46
programme.desc: The 113th Drama Serial, inspired by the lives of Koizumi Setsu and Lafcadio Hearn also known as Koizumi Yakumo, portrays those who were left behind in the rapidly Westernizing Meiji era. At its heart is a woman captivated by ghost stories and her foreign-born husband. Together, they share a life that seems ordinary yet delightfully odd.

programme.title: Project X: The Challengers-New Beginnings "4,500-ton Bridge Replacement" (R)
programme.desc: Project X returns for the first time in 18 years. The former series featured people involved in project related to the Japanese industry and contemporary history. The new series focuses on people in the "Lost Era" following the collapse of the bubble economy. In every era, there are always those take on challenges. Even without receiving praise or being in the spotlight, some dedicate themselves to their work. The documentary delivers passion and courage right to you.

programme.title: Drama 10 "Shiba Inu's Rule" Eps. 8 (R)
programme.desc: An egoistic magazine editor in his forties finds himself completely alone at work-abandoned by colleagues, with only his Shiba Inu by his side. Inspired by the dog, he proposes a Shiba-themed magazine. Misfits are forced to collaborate, sparking friction and chaos. But through the dog’s gentle gaze, ideas emerge, and broken hearts begin to heal.

Drawn to his easygoing personality, a local elderly woman gives him a single-story house. He begins living with his 18-year-old cousin Natsumi (Mori Nana), who has just moved to Tokyo from Yamagata. Before long, people carrying quiet burdens begin to gather around him.

programme.desc: Covering consumer shopping information, trendy specialty stores, travel guides, and the LOHAS propositions of trendy people.

programme.title: Taiwan Criminal Files - EP 1422
programme.desc: Discuss the difficult inside story behind the news events, lead the audience to explore the development of the event from an objective perspective, and strive to enlighten the audience's new thinking.

programme.title: Travel Together - EP 581
programme.desc: A real-life working travel show, each trip is led by Dou Zhikong and Wang Chuan-yi, who are composed of a "handsome working group" of artist guests. They travel together to get away from the hustle and bustle of the city and explore the most healing rural secrets.

programme.title: Eyeshot To The Cross-Strait - EP 806
programme.desc: Discussion on cross-strait issues include: Taiwanese investment, transformation and upgrading, future trends, environmental protection and green energy, cultural and creative consumption, cultural customs, enterprise development, future potential, development trends of cross-strait film and television cooperation

programme.title: All Star Quiz Show - EP 1153
programme.desc: The puzzle reality program, with the curator Sam Tseng as the knowledge gatekeeper, tests every artist star who comes to challenge the Jiugongge puzzle game. programme.title: The Exorcist's Meter - EP 15

programme.desc: Follow host Janis Chan and her team as they travel across more than 10 provinces in China, exploring the nation's cutting-edge technological breakthroughs that have transformed society and accelerated development.

programme.title: Star Trail - Jackson Wang Special
programme.desc: Host Lai Chi-shan's new interview programme takes advantage of the tours of various stars of the Hong Kong music scene to offer a glimpse into their stage presence and reveal their lesser-known off-stage personalities.

programme.title: JSG Billboard 2025
programme.desc: Count down to the top 20 songs on JSG Billboard every episode!

programme.desc: Cantopop At 50 invites original singers or established singers to reinterpret popular classics that span multiple generations, bringing high-quality music for the fans' enjoyment.

programme.title: Bad and Crazy - EP 12
programme.desc: The story is about Su Yeol (Lee Dong Wook), a corrupt yet practical detective who manifests a split personality K (Wi Ha Joon) who harbours a sense of justice. Watch how he tries to solve various crimes!

programme.title: Destined - EP 30
programme.desc: Lin Yu Ru (Song Yi), the daughter of a cloth merchant who’s suffered childhood hardships, is married off to Gu Jiu Si (Bai Jing Ting), the notorious son of Yangzhou's wealthiest family, infamous for his indolent ways. They grow closer despite their differences.

programme.title: Destined - EP 31
programme.desc: Lin Yu Ru (Song Yi), the daughter of a cloth merchant who’s suffered childhood hardships, is married off to Gu Jiu Si (Bai Jing Ting), the notorious son of Yangzhou's wealthiest family, infamous for his indolent ways. They grow closer despite their differences.

programme.title: Ye Cheng - EP 3
programme.desc: Shu Cheng (Claire Jia), the daughter of the first aristocratic family, pretends to be a playgirl to conceal her identify. While promoting Shen Ye (Yuan Hao) as a courtesan, she discovers his multiple identities. They have no choice but to work together.

programme.title: Always Home - EP 20
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] This youth campus drama tells the story of a group of children who grew up together in a doctors’ residential apartment. They go through all the important milestones in life together, always supporting one another as they study, work, and pursue their dreams.

programme.title: Always Home - EP 21
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] This youth campus drama tells the story of a group of children who grew up together in a doctors’ residential apartment. programme.title: Mother and Mom - EP 6
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] The drama depicts the 'worrying' Daechi-dong life of three generations of women, centered on a passionate working mom Jung Eun (Jeon Hye Jin) and her daughter, as they prepare for the entrance test to enter a famous English academy.

programme.title: Bad and Crazy - EP 12
programme.desc: The story is about Su Yeol (Lee Dong Wook), a corrupt yet practical detective who manifests a split personality K (Wi Ha Joon) who harbours a sense of justice. Watch how he tries to solve various crimes!

programme.title: My Perfect Stranger - EP 13
programme.desc: The story depicts a strange and beautiful story of time travel between Yoon Hae Jun (Kim Dong Wook) who seeks the truth behind a murder case, and Baek Yoon Young (Jin Ki Joo) who wants to prevent the marriage of her parents while getting trapped in year 1987.

programme.title: Duel on Mount Hua - Nine Yin True Sutra - EP 2

programme.title: Prism Breaker - EP 19
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Chui Sze-sze dies. Tai Wing-keung then decides to rebel against Tai Cho-fuk. Tai Cho-fuk tells Tai Wing-keung to locate Chow Chun-kit. And he takes Ho Tin-yu away. Auyeung Kwan is summoned to ICAC as he is under investigation. He stays calm and answers with ease while being interrogated.

programme.title: The Wanted Detective - EP 26
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] On his wedding day, Xiao Bei Ming (Wang Xing Yue), the best detective of Qi, was framed as a demon and fled into the lake on the charge of murdering his master and treason. Mrs Chiu has a stroke and faints as she hears Ho-yee mentioning she has no marriage plan. After being resuscitated, Mrs Chiu scolds Rio for lying. Ho-yee helps cover up his lies.

programme.title: Golden City (Ep 751-800) VVD Mandarin - EP 765
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: My Perfect Stranger - EP 14
programme.desc: The story depicts a strange and beautiful story of time travel between Yoon Hae Jun (Kim Dong Wook) who seeks the truth behind a murder case, and Baek Yoon Young (Jin Ki Joo) who wants to prevent the marriage of her parents while getting trapped in year 1987.

programme.title: Duel on Mount Hua - Nine Yin True Sutra - EP 3
programme.desc: Nine Yin True Sutra - [With English and Chinese subtitles] Set in a reimagined Jin Yong martial arts world, this series is divided into four chapters. Heroes from across the martial world gather at Mount Hua, fiercely competing for the ultimate martial arts supremacy.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2093
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends.

programme.title: Prism Breaker - EP 20
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Tai Wing-keung agrees to become a tainted witness and testify against Tai Cho-fuk. Lau Hok-fan tells Lee Nga-man about the news and Chui Sze-sze’s death. Lee Nga-man is beside herself with grief. She disbands her team and decides to take revenge on Tai Cho-fuk by herself.

programme.title: The Wanted Detective - EP 27
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] On his wedding day, Xiao Bei Ming (Wang Xing Yue), the best detective of Qi, was framed as a demon and fled into the lake on the charge of murdering his master and treason. Three years later, he returned and joins a group of witty partners to seek justice.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2093
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends.

programme.title: The Heir to the Throne (with Eng Subs) - EP 25
programme.desc: Sau-yan and Chi-tung save Yee-ting and Lai-kei just in time. Yee-ting declares she is starting a legal battle. But Sau-yi calms her down. Hiu-ling discovers Chi-lam’s phone on the yacht. Chi-bun finds out the situation and then hands over the phone to the police. Sau-yan sees Lai-kei’s suicide note.

programme.title: The Limbo - EP 6
programme.desc: As the New Year approaches, an unexpected subsidence accident occurs at the old department store, Luobai Mall, in Haizhou City, trapping 13 people underground. This race against time and for survival becomes a profound test of humanity, morality, and faith...

programme.title: The Limbo - EP 7
programme.desc: As the New Year approaches, an unexpected subsidence accident occurs at the old department store, Luobai Mall, in Haizhou City, trapping 13 people underground. This race against time and for survival becomes a profound test of humanity, morality, and faith...

programme.desc: Nine Yin True Sutra - [With English and Chinese subtitles] Set in a reimagined Jin Yong martial arts world, this series is divided into four chapters. Heroes from across the martial world gather at Mount Hua, fiercely competing for the ultimate martial arts supremacy.

programme.title: Sinister Beings 2 - EP 28
programme.desc: Chun-sum and Wai-lik rush to the scene. They fail to evacuate people, and a terrorist attack is launched. Kwun-fung, who is stranded somewhere on a hill, is saved by some old villager, and his way of thinking radically changes. He astonishingly makes some unusual move. Kwun-fung then removes all digital traces.

programme.title: Prism Breaker - EP 21
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] While covertly tailing Auyeung Kwan, Chow Chun-kit is full of doubts. However, when Chow Chun-kit finds out Auyeung Kwan often misses him at the cha chaan teng where he met Kwong, he believes he is not the mole. But Auyeung Kwan reminds Chow Chun-kit to be wary of Lui Hok-sum’s unusual maneuvers, and in particular, his suspicious behavior and the scheme behind.

programme.title: The Heir to the Throne (with Eng Subs) - EP 26
programme.desc: Sau-yi accidentally hears Ka-pik speaking with someone on the phone. He is shocked to realize Chi-bun is Ko Sing’s son. Ko Sing abruptly dies due to some traffic accident. He called Sau-yi and also Ka-pik before his death. But the duo deny they have something to do with this matter. Ko Tsun gets drunk and then tells Ho-yee about Chi-bun’s true background.

programme.title: Golden City (Ep 751-800) VVD Mandarin - EP 766
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Class of Distinction - EP 11
programme.desc: Leon Lai ,Jessica Hester Hsuan,Theresa Lee,Violet Lee Yang

programme.title: Knot To Treasure - EP 4
programme.desc: Wei (Zhu Jiang), the eldest son of Wei (Chen Jiewen), is wild and untamed. Under family pressure, he finally marries Shan (Zhang Fengni), with whom he has been dating for many years. After their marriage, Yat-sen develops an extramarital affair with Yan (Cui Jiabao), eventually living with her and abandoning Shan. Later, realizing Yan's overly open attitude towards relationships, he decides to pursue Shan again.

programme.title: Shadow Of Justice - EP 17
programme.desc: Because of some transfer arrangement and several complicated cases, AICIP Au Yeung Chung (Bobby Au Yeung) and CUSP Tsui Hay-yi (Joey Meng) become collaborating partners. The duo have mutual understanding. Sheung Siu (Jeannie Chan), daughter of a logistics company boss, hates Au Yeung Chung as she is certain that he has caused her family to break up. Au Yeung Chung had promised the late Mrs. Sheung he would be tolerant of Sheung Siu.

programme.title: Shadow Of Justice - EP 18
programme.desc: Because of some transfer arrangement and several complicated cases, AICIP Au Yeung Chung (Bobby Au Yeung) and CUSP Tsui Hay-yi (Joey Meng) become collaborating partners. Au Yeung Chung had promised the late Mrs. Sheung he would be tolerant of Sheung Siu.

programme.title: Defected, The - EP 7
programme.desc: Inspector Sheung-bang of the Crime Squad was once a rising star in the police force. While trying to save a colleague, he was shot by a gangster, his life forever changed. After his miraculous survival, Sheung-bang pursues his case with even greater resolve, earning him the nickname "Iron Detective," though he constantly suffers from the aftereffects.

programme.title: Defected, The - EP 8
programme.desc: Inspector Sheung-bang of the Crime Squad was once a rising star in the police force. While trying to save a colleague, he was shot by a gangster, his life forever changed. After his miraculous survival, Sheung-bang pursues his case with even greater resolve, earning him the nickname "Iron Detective," though he constantly suffers from the aftereffects.

programme.title: Gods Of Honour - EP 11
programme.desc: NAR JAR (CHAN HO MAN, BENNY) was a ‘Fire master’ in his previous life. He was killed by LEE CHING (YUEN WAH). After reincarnation, he ironically becomes CHING’s third son. He is very much affected by his old memories and cannot forgive his father. CHING also keeps his distance from him because of his exotic nature and eventually sends him away with excuses. Luckily, he is saved by some kind people and becomes a General when he is still a teenager.

programme.title: Just Love - EP 20
programme.desc: Judge KO HEI MAN (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER) and KOT KWOK KWONG (CHAN KAM HUNG, SUNNY) have agreed that MAN will concentrate on her career while KWONG will be taking care of the housework after they get married. Everything is in harmony until KWONG’s father discovers MAN and KWONG’s pre-marriage written agreement. Their relationship complicates ever since._x000D__x000D_ To make things worse, KWONG breaks the agreement and demands to have his own career.

programme.title: Get On A Flat - EP 16
programme.desc: Rewind to the 2008 financial crisis and supermarket manager Che Chi-ming (Andrew Lam) hurriedly sells his apartment. Who could have known even though Chi-ming has been chasing after property prices for 14 years, he still cannot get on the property ladder once again. A middle class lifestyle is tragically transformed into a "midlife crisis"._x000D__x000D_Chi-ming’s wife Man Wai (Elena Kong) is obsessed with property ownership. She goes to work as a part-time maid at some luxury home.

programme.title: Fist Within Four Walls, A - EP 25
programme.desc: CHOR AU-KUEN (Ruco Chan) bears the grief of the loss of his family and returns to the walled city in hopes of finding his long lost sister, only to find out that the place he grew up in has become a lawless no man's land. Concealing his real identity as a Bajiquan master, he creates a new identity and gets acquainted with a feisty hair salon lady boss, TIU LAN (Nancy Wu), a dentist, DUEN YING-FUNG (Benjamin Yuen), and a worker, BUT TAK-LIU (Lam Tsz Sin).

programme.title: Silver Spoon, Sterling Shackles - EP 40
programme.desc: During the 1930s in Hong Kong, where east meets west, feminist activists started campaigning for women's rights, seeking to uproot the phenomenon of men's superiority over women. Though having studied abroad in England and leading a western lifestyle, CHUNG CHEUK-MAN (Damian Lau) , a well-known Chinese barrister, is very traditional indeed.

programme.title: At The Threshold Of An Era - EP 1
programme.desc: The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60’s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities. With the help from his best friend MA CHI KEUNG (Kwok Chun On), TIM took over an incomplete village housing development.

programme.title: Gods Of Honour - EP 11
programme.desc: NAR JAR (CHAN HO MAN, BENNY) was a ‘Fire master’ in his previous life. He was killed by LEE CHING (YUEN WAH). After reincarnation, he ironically becomes CHING’s third son. programme.title: Madam Cutie On Duty - EP 1
programme.desc: FA PING (Priscilla Wong), who was often made fun of by the others for being ugly during her childhood, underwent cosmetic surgery in the wake of an accident. Ever since then, she has been firmly convinced that an attractive appearance has a significant impact on one's life, and remains the same after joining the police.

Concealing his real identity as a Bajiquan master, he creates a new identity and gets acquainted with a feisty hair salon lady boss, TIU LAN (Nancy Wu), a dentist, DUEN YING-FUNG (Benjamin Yuen), and a worker, BUT TAK-LIU (Lam Tsz Sin).

programme.title: At The Threshold Of An Era - EP 2
programme.desc: The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60’s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities. With the help from his best friend MA CHI KEUNG (Kwok Chun On), TIM took over an incomplete village housing development.

programme.title: At The Threshold Of An Era - EP 3
programme.desc: The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60’s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities. With the help from his best friend MA CHI KEUNG (Kwok Chun On), TIM took over an incomplete village housing development.

programme.title: Model from Hell
programme.desc: Anna, an exceptional student in a modelling school, becomes the target of envy from fellow models, who all die mysteriously when they want to harm her. It turns out that when Anna is upset, she undergoes a terrifying transformation and can wield lethal psychic power...

programme.title: Loving You
programme.desc: A bad-tempered, womanizing cop who always neglects his wife is shot in the head as he hunts down a drug dealer. Though he miraculously survives, he must depend on his wife to nurse him back to health. During the recovery, he begins to re-evaluate his life and repair the damages of his broken marriage.

programme.title: The Exodus
programme.desc: A low-ranking cop discovers a group of women, including his superior, Madam Fang and his wife, plotting to eliminate the world of men.

programme.title: The Illegal Immigrant
programme.desc: This is a gritty and realistic Chinatown tale about the life of a Chinese illegal immigrant and his journey in New York. He is looking for a fake marriage with a girl so as to gain the right of abode there. Despite all the hardships and misfortunes, he tries to cope with life and reach for his dreams.

programme.title: Golden Chicken 2
programme.desc: The sequel is set in 2046 when a 82-year-old Ah Kam stops a heartbroken young man from taking memory loss pills. To help ease his pain, Ah Kam shares her life stories from 2003, one of Hong Kong's toughest year with SARS, including the different people she comes across and the bittersweet romance between herself and her cousin.

programme.title: The Story Of My Son
programme.desc: Li attempts to make a fortune at the horse-racing tracks, but is subsequently entangled with loan sharks. Li becomes debt-laden while his sons are harassed by debt collectors, when more heart-wrenching events begin to unfold.

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Wing is an elite in the police force but has been drowning his guilt in booze after his entire team was killed by the "Gang of Five" in a mission. A year later, a young rookie detective with a complicated background is assigned to partner Wing and manages to inspire him into action, as Wing vows to take down the gang.

programme.title: The Bride With White Hair II
programme.desc: After being betrayed by Zhuo, the white-haired witch Lian seeks revenge by slaughtering her way through the eight martial arts clans. However, she is soon attacked by a man whose bride she has abducted. Meanwhile, Zhuo, who is waiting on a hilltop for a flower to bloom for Lian's restoration, hastens to save her upon realizing the danger she is in.

programme.title: Whatever You Want
programme.desc: An illegitimate daughter of a businessman gets three wishes from a genie, Bo. However, Bo's magical power is far from perfect, leading to much hilarity in this charming fantasy comedy.

programme.title: Rob-B-Hood
programme.desc: The famous "Gang Trio" is hired to kidnap a baby for 30 million dollars. When they realize that the triad is after both the ransom and the baby's life, they decide to make the hostage their protege. Cornered by cops and threatened by gangsters, the three 'Rob-B-Hood' must put the baby safely back in his cradle.

programme.title: Royal Tramp
programme.desc: Wei Xiao Bao is sent by a revolutionary group to be a spy in the imperial palace and find "The Sutra of 42 Chapters". Xiao Bao soon befriends Emperor Kang Xi but must carry out his mission at the same time, so he is caught between two camps.

programme.title: The Chinese Feast
programme.desc: Sun wants to start a new life as a chef in Canada and struggles to learn cooking skills from a restaurant owner, Au. While Sun will represent his restaurant to participate in a cooking competition, his skill is not good enough, and he has to seek help from a legendary master chef in order to win the ultimate challenge.

programme.title: Maybe It's Love
programme.desc: A girl Marble witnesses a murder case and reports it to the police. After much investigation, the police can only sort out the complicated relationships between a rich merchant's mistress, a postman, a shop owner and his wife, but find no clue as to who the murderer is. Therefore, Marble decides to carry out her own investigation...

programme.title: God of Gambler's Return
programme.desc: The God of Gamblers, Gao Jin, quits gambling and live a quiet life with his wife. However, a Taiwanese crime boss wants to become the new God of Gamblers and get rid of him, so he kills Gao Jin's pregnant wife to force him to the casino table. Gao Jin is indignant and vows to fight the crime boss to avenge his wife's death.

programme.title: Perfect Girls
programme.desc: Chi will inherit his dying grandfather's fortune with one condition - he has to be married in a month, otherwise the money goes to his uncle, Robert. Chi falls in love with Siu Siu, but Robert intends to stop them by sending Moraine to seduce Chi. When Moraine decides to marry Chi for money, Robert stops her and reveals their plot.

programme.title: Mr. Virgin
programme.desc: Mr. Virgin is a romantic comedy about a twenty-nine year-old man Chao Yu-ting (Alfred Chang) who has seemingly been cursed. He becomes paranoid when a Feng Shui expert tells him it will be unlucky for him to marry before the age of thirty... so comical chaos line the days up to his next birthday!

programme.title: Girl with the Diamond Slipper
programme.desc: An aspiring TV actress gets into hot water when a stolen diamond is hidden in the shoes she bought for a party.

programme.title: Cherie
programme.desc: Cherie Chung plays the title character in this sexy romance as a fitness instructor who attracts the attentions of a wealthy businessman and a handsome photographer.

programme.title: Dream Lover
programme.desc: Ka Shing meets Kitty one day and they fall quickly in love. However, Kitty disappears shortly and when they meet years later, she is already married. To comfort himself, Ka Shing asks a mystic master to let Kitty appear in his dreams so that he can be with her constantly, even though she can only be his dream lover...

programme.title: Teenage Dreamers
programme.desc: Ting Ting is a student in an all-girl high school. She tries out for the school's stage production of Romeo and Juliet with an all-boy school and promptly falls for the lead, Jackson. While Ting Ting is swept away by the excitement of her first love, Jackson turns out to be more of a player than a partner.

programme.title: Don't Open Your Eyes
programme.desc: A cop has the ability to see ghosts, which is something that has been passed down from generation to generation in his family. He must learn how to manage this gift when he is confronted by the ghost of a notorious criminal whom he has shot.

programme.title: All's Well End's Well 97
programme.desc: Mr Lo has three sons, Leung, Fay and Kung; and a daughter-in-law, Eliza. While they seem like a normal family, their relationships need mending. Leung and Fay play a prank on their brother Kung on his birthday by falsely claiming that he has won the lottery. This sets off a chain reaction of funny mishaps that finally brings the family together.

programme.title: Undercover Hidden Dragon
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy, Fat is a gangster who suffers from amnesia. Believing that he is actually an undercover policeman, Fat attempts to arrest gang leader Big Bro, but instead becomes the gangsters' best ally. To complicate matters further, a gangster named Wind, who looks exactly like Fat, starts a turf war with Big Bro.

programme.title: Face to Face
programme.desc: Tamotsu dies in a skiing accident and his roommate Yoshio marries his wife as well as inherits his entire fortune. At Tamotsu's funeral, Yoshio sees a badly disfigured old man and that is only the beginning of an evil downfall for him...

programme.title: The Eye 10
programme.desc: This third installment of 'The Eye' horror movie series is about the creepy adventures of a group of teenagers who summon spirits by using the ten methods outlined in a mysterious comic book while vacationing in Thailand.

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: Ma Wing Jing and his brother arrive in Shanghai to make their fortune. Befriending a powerful mobster Tam, Ma is given his nightclub when he saves Tam's life. Ma's fortune rises but he must overcome the corruption and violence to survive.

programme.title: It's a Wonderful Life
programme.desc: Hong Kong tycoon Ren Da Kuan takes care of his family that spans four generations, yet his three sons grapple with their own challenges. Everything changes when his daughter returns from studying in France with her friend Roberto. Roberto brings a wave of transformation to the Ren family, sparking new hope and opportunities for all.

programme.title: Beauty And The 7 Beasts
programme.desc: Teddy, once a renowned movie star, is facing a career decline. To make a living, he accepts five disciples to shape them into stars. Teddy's career regains momentum after he reunites with his long-lost daughter, but he is also confronted by a rival at the same time. His daughter and disciples decide to help him overcome this difficult situation...

programme.title: Cop Shop Babes
programme.desc: Island East Police Station headed by Madam Lui is known for its "Cop Shop Babes" as all the officers there are female. Two police officers, Beer and Satay, apply for an internal transfer to this station in order to approach the girls. It is at this time that the police receives a bomb threat - can they resolve the case?

programme.title: How to Choose a Royal Bride
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager has arranged for a Minister's daughter Qiong Yao, to become Emperor Kangxi's concubine. However, Qiong Yao escapes in pursuit of freedom in marriage and Kangxi is happy to not go through with the union. When Kangxi travels incognito to Jiangnan, he serendipitously encounters Qiong Yao, who disguises herself as a man...

programme.title: Tales Of Larceny
programme.desc: Connecting all the antics of bosses, monks, beggars, and thieves is the slippery and sinuous efforts of three pickpockets so adept at their chosen skill that they can even trick three beauties of their underwear without missing a step.

programme.title: The Water Margin
programme.desc: This is a martial arts epic directed by Chang Cheh. In the Sung Dynasty, the government is run by corrupt officials, so Sung Jiang gathers 108 outlaws at Mount Liang and establishes a band of patriotic heroes to end the repression of brutal overlords.

programme.title: A Maid From Heaven
programme.desc: The seventh daughter of the Jade Emperor is banished from heaven to live a mortal life as she is very mischievous. She falls in love with a young village lad Yong, who sold himself to work for the rich so as to bury his father. The goddess sisters help Yong to pay his debt so the lovebirds can be together. Is this going to end happily-ever-after?

programme.title: The Love Eterne
programme.desc: Ying Tai disguises herself as a boy to go to school and falls hopelessly in love with her classmate, Shan Bo. After Shan Bo realizes her true identity, he proposes marriage to Ying Tai. However, they are kept apart as she is engaged to another man. Knowing Shan Bo died in despair, Ying Tai is in deep sorrow and kills herself at his grave.

programme.title: Puppy Love
programme.desc: To the tune of the Osmonds hit song, this is a story of adolescent playfulness & innocence lost. Two best friends grow up together and teasingly meet two delightfully impish boys leading to the four to flirtatiously intermingle. However, the innocence of partner swapping eventually leads to a roller-coaster bouts of misunderstood emotions.

programme.title: The Delightful Forest
programme.desc: The legendary hero Wu Sung is sent to a prison in Meng province after murdering his adulterous sister-in-law and her lover. While in prison, the officer Shih En spares Wu the humiliating baton punishment. Owing Shih a favour, Wu decides to help Shih get his restaurant back at all costs when it was forcefully taken over by a local thug.

programme.title: The Big Sting
programme.desc: Three buddies find a rare artifact known as the Double-Faced God but are poisoned by Lady Wu who steals the treasure from them. Before they die, they get their wives to promise to train their children to take back what is rightfully theirs. These kids grow up to exact a vengeance that turns out to be more hilarious than horrific in this comedy.

programme.title: The Champion
programme.desc: After years in prison, Lu Hu returns home to find himself set up by his ruthless brother Piao, who has taken over the family coal mine business and imprisoned their sister. Hu takes down Piao and saves his sister but their coal mine falls into the hands of a Japanese gang, which Hu and his sister must fight in order to get it back.

programme.title: We Love Millionaires
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, three beautiful Hong Kong salesgirls travel to Osaka in Japan to pursue their dreams of marrying a rich man. They masquerade as high society debutantes and make their way to a posh resort to meet and woo millionaires (or fake ones!).

programme.title: Duel For Gold
programme.desc: Six swordsmen, including two sisters and their husbands, a ranger and a security man, are trying to steal a million gold taels from the Fu Lai Treasury House, not knowing that one of them is actually an undercover hero. In their quest, they have to double-cross and outwit one another...

programme.title: Double Bliss
programme.desc: Dong and Chu plan to get married but their families who are lifelong rivals, disapproved. They decide to fake suicide and eventually get both of their parents to settle their differences and approve the marriage. Concurrently, a record company announces that they will release Dong's songs, leading to double bliss for the couple.

programme.title: The Chinese Boxer
programme.desc: A Japanese karate master and Diao Er, who has been expelled from his martial arts school, return to the school to kill the school master and his disciples. After the massacre, disciple Lei Ming embarks on a vigorous training regime and vows to avenge their deaths. A fatal battle is about to begin...

programme.title: The 82 Tenants
programme.desc: Continuing the success of the classic comedy "House of 72 tenants", this sequel tells the stories of tenants living in an old building in Hong Kong who are forced to evict by the developers. Some tenants prefer to take the compensation while some resist the move. Will the acquisitions plan destroy the harmony of the neighborhood?

programme.title: The 36th Chamber of Shaolin
programme.desc: Gordon Liu plays an anti-Manchu rebel who escapes to the Shaolin Temple and learns what it truly takes to become a martial arts master by challenging the 35 Shaolin Kung Fu chambers, eventually creating the 36th chamber himself.

programme.title: Crazy Shaolin Disciples
programme.desc: The story revolves around three lay disciples of the Shaolin Temple: Fang Shi Yu, Hong Xi Guan, and Hu Hui Qian. Monk Jie instructs them in martial arts, but their frequent competitions with fellow disciple Wu Qing spark rivalries. The once serene Shaolin Temple is plunged into chaos, yet even the abbot cannot help but be amused by their antics.

programme.title: Heroes Two
programme.desc: Shaolin disciple Hong escapes from the burning temple after it is attacked by the Qing army and is badly wounded. He is handed over to the Qing soldiers by Fang as he mistakes Hong for a bandit. When Fang realizes his mistakes, he tries all ways to help Hong escape so that they can team up to fight the Qing army together.

programme.title: Asia-pol
programme.desc: Asiapol agent Yang Ming Xuan trails a shipment of contraband gold being delivered to gang leader, George Eaton. He enlists the help of a Chinese woman who is trying to avenge her sister and narrowly escapes several deadly traps as he closes in on Eaton's location. This spy film is loosely inspired by the James Bond movies.

programme.title: The Vengeful Beauty
programme.desc: The Flying Guillotine assassins are secretly working for the Emperor and its leader Jin is sent to kill Hon, who knows this secret. Hon's pregnant wife Rong seeks to kill Jin but retreats to protect her unborn child. When she is hunted down herself, Rong hooks up with a former Flying Guillotine member and her martial arts senior to fight back...

programme.title: Gossip Street
programme.desc: All neighbours gather to gossip in flat number 8 on the second floor of the Gossip Street apartment building! Most of the residents are common people from all walks of life and there is never a lack of laughter or sarcasm in the neighbourhood. However, when a local mobster wants to change the place into a gambling den, things get serious...

programme.title: Dawn will Come
programme.desc: Liang Cai drugged the beautiful Qiu Rong and raped her, but promised to marry her after getting his parent's consent. Since then, there is no news of his proposal and Qiu Rong confronts Liang Cai when she finds herself pregnant. This is when she discovers that he has already married a rich noble girl and even plans to kill her...

programme.title: The Golden Sword
programme.desc: Swordsman Long meets Feng while searching for his missing father and they soon fall in love and marry. When Long is kidnapped by 'Dragon Gate Palace' one day, Feng embarks on a rescue mission and reunites with Long, who manages to escape. Together, they confront the head of 'Dragon Gate Palace', and uncover a long-hidden secret.

programme.title: Hong Kong Nocturne
programme.desc: This joyous, raucous, & colorful tunefest showcases the little seen dancing talents of celebrated kung-fu swordswoman Cheng Pei-Pei, as one of 3 girls dancing their way to the top.

programme.title: The Black Butterfly
programme.desc: Kwan leads a double life as a waitress and as an infamous outlaw skilled in martial arts, The Black Butterfly. When she steals a cache of gold from the Five Devils Rock bandits, she soon has the bandits, and the government, on her tail.

programme.title: The Amorous Lotus Pan
programme.desc: Adapted from the renowned Chinese novel, The Water Margin, this is the story of a poor and beautiful girl Lotus Pan, who is raped by her master and had to be married off to a midget who treats her badly. Lost and lonely, Pan unwittingly becomes a pawn in the game of lust between her husband's playboy brother Wu Song, and a murderous man Men Ching.

programme.title: The Casino
programme.desc: After being separated for many years, two childhood lovers meet in a possibly mythical "Lucky Casino" and vow to rid the establishment of the corrupt military generals, criminals and extortionists!

programme.title: The Dream of the Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the great Chinese classic novel of the same name, the son of renowned Jia family, Bao Yu, is deeply in love with his cousin, Dai Yu. However, his mother disapproves of their relationship and plots to arrange Bao Yu to marry another rich girl, resulting in a tragic ending for the perfect couple.

programme.title: Bat Without Wings
programme.desc: The Bat Without Wings, a notorious rapist-murderer, has returned after a five-year absence. A young swordsman and a convoy master investigate the case and suspect that the Bat may be framed. A saying goes that a treasure map is hidden under the Bat's knife, so they try to use that to hunt the real culprit...

programme.title: The Lark
programme.desc: Sixties pop star Carrie Ku plays the "Little Lark" in this romantic-drama of mistaken identity that is a treasure trove of some of the most popular Mandarin songs of all time.

programme.title: Clan of Amazons
programme.desc: The martial arts world is plunged into terror when a mysterious figure known as the 'Embroidery Bandit' starts to attack convoys of precious materials. Seemingly unstoppable, the frightened clans decide to call on the expertise of Lu Xiao Feng, an inquisitive fighter and detective to capture the culprit.

programme.title: Hu's Travel Agency
programme.desc: Hu's Travel Agency features TV host Hu Gua with his children Hsiao-Chen and Hu Shih-An, running Taiwan's "most human-centered travel agency." Centered in Miaoli, they blend family bonds and local culture to create heartfelt journeys.

programme.title: Hu's Travel Agency
programme.desc: Hu's Travel Agency features TV host Hu Gua with his children Hsiao-Chen and Hu Shih-An, running Taiwan's "most human-centered travel agency." Centered in Miaoli, they blend family bonds and local culture to create heartfelt journeys.

programme.title: Discover New Taiwan Step By Step
programme.desc: The creative production team goes around Taiwan in search of inspiring stories in the country. Get to know more unique individuals and discover the true spirit of Taiwan.

programme.title: Battle ATM
programme.desc: Creating a brand-new interactive ATM that combined with puzzle solving and daily life! Guests can win money by taking three rounds of intellectual challenges from the ATM, turn wisdom into money! Futuristic program scenes with video game clearing concept, where challengers engage in the intellectual competition to switch on the ATM. Those who won goes to the ultimate challenge.

programme.desc: Super Taste focuses on funny travel style to discover destinations and local-dishes. Standing on audience's view point, program's hosts introduce every sightseeing sites with close-witness, young and humorous way to announce the spirits of Super Taste.

programme.title: Chop Chop Show
programme.desc: The show invites younger generations to talk about relationship, career, entertainment, current affairs, and all the other popular topics that they care and complain about.

programme.title: The Big Call
programme.desc: Dastardly phone scammers are stealing millions from people from all walks of life. Altruistic young policeman Ding stealthily combines forces with a highly skilled female undercover agent to stop them.

programme.title: A Date with The Future - EP 21
